text: Awesome and very experience trainers. Joe is able to identify the issue ... Sometimes it's not the furkid but the pawrent. We had our furkid undergo Board and train with Joe and HB. Not only we had fun our furkid had successfully graduated and now our bond with our furkid is so strong and listens to our commands. Kudos to Joe and HB. Thank you for your patience with us and not giving up on us. Thank you
Great place for building confidence in dogs. Lots of structured socialising and training.
The best place in Singapore to train your puppies

Joe doesn't teach just theory , Joe teaches facts and shows us how to apply what we learn in the real world. Loads of experience , and really knows how to fix any problem. If you are looking for the Steve Irwin of dogs, Joe Klass will be your go to trainer
